system.effect:
Target: A Pokémon
Effect: The target gains any three of the following Poké Edges: Skill Improvement, Advanced Mobility, or Capability Training. The target may gain Poké Edges this way even if they do not meet the prerequisites, however, they must still follow other limitations; Advanced Mobility can only improve a Movement Capability once, for example. A Pokémon may be targeted only once ever by Tutelage.
prerequisites: Level 10 or Two of Charm Intimidate Intuition or Pokémon Education at Adept Rank
system.name: Surge of Spirit [CR]
